verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H3201>it,<s%> but could not prevail against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

It was <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H758>"Syria<s%> is <S%H5117>allied<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>" His <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H5128>trembled,<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> as the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> <S%H5128>tremble<s%> <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> "Go <S%H3318>out<s%> now to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> <S%H7610>you,<s%> and Shearjashub your <S%H1121>son,<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8585>conduit<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H1295>pool,<s%> on the <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3526>fuller<s%>'s <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H8104>him,<s%> 'Be careful, and keep <S%H8252>calm.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, neither let your heart be <S%H7401>faint<s%> because of these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails<s%> of <S%H6226>smoking<s%> <S%H181>torches,<s%> for the <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> and <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah.<s%>
Because <S%H758>Syria,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah,<s%> have <S%H3289>plotted<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H559>you,<s%> saying,

<S%H5927>"Let<s%>'s go up against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6973>tear<s%> it <S%H1234>apart,<s%> and let's divide it among <S%H4427>ourselves,<s%> and set up a <S%H4428>king<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> even the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2870>Tabeel.<s%>"
<S%H3541>This<s%> is what the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> "It shall not <S%H6965>stand,<s%> neither shall it happen."

For the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> is <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> is <S%H7526>Rezin;<s%> and within <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be <S%H2865>broken<s%> in <S%H5971>pieces,<s%> so that it shall not be a people;

and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%> If you will not <S%H539>believe,<s%> surely you shall not be <S%H539>established.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> to <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H7592>"Ask<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> it either in the <S%H6009>depth,<s%> or in the <S%H1361>height<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>"
But <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H7592>ask,<s%> neither will I <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H1004>now,<s%> house of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Is it not <S%H4592>enough<s%> for you to try the <S%H3811>patience<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> that you will try the <S%H3811>patience<s%> of my God <S%H430>also?<s%>

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> himself will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H226>sign.<s%> <S%H5959>Behold,<s%> the virgin will <S%H2030>conceive,<s%> and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6005>Immanuel.<s%>
He shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> when he <S%H3045>knows<s%> to <S%H3988>refuse<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H2896>good.<s%>

For before the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> to <S%H3988>refuse<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> whose <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> you <S%H6973>abhor<s%> shall <S%H6440>be<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H5971>you,<s%> on your people, and on your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> that have not <S%H935>come,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> even the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H8319>whistle<s%> for the <S%H2070>fly<s%> that is in the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H2975>rivers<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and for the <S%H1682>bee<s%> that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall all <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H1327>desolate<s%> <S%H5158>valleys,<s%> in the <S%H5357>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> on all <S%H5285>thorn<s%> <S%H5097>hedges,<s%> and on all pastures.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H1548>shave<s%> with a <S%H8593>razor<s%> that is <S%H7917>hired<s%> in the parts <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> even with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and it shall also <S%H5595>consume<s%> the <S%H2206>beard.<s%>
It shall happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that a <S%H376>man<s%> shall keep <S%H2421>alive<s%> a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H5697>cow,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6629>sheep;<s%>

and it shall <S%H7230>happen,<s%> that because of the abundance of <S%H2461>milk<s%> which they shall <S%H6213>give<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2529>butter:<s%> for everyone will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> that is <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that every <S%H4725>place<s%> where there were a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1612>vines<s%> at a <S%H505>thousand<s%> silver <S%H3701>shekels,<s%> shall be for <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns.<s%>
People will <S%H935>go<s%> there with <S%H2671>arrows<s%> and with <S%H7198>bow,<s%> because all the <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns.<s%>

All the <S%H2022>hills<s%> that were <S%H5737>cultivated<s%> with the <S%H4576>hoe,<s%> you shall not come <S%H935>there<s%> for <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns;<s%> but it shall be for the sending <S%H4916>forth<s%> of <S%H7794>oxen,<s%> and for the <S%H4823>treading<s%> of <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>"
